qas.question: Pachelbel's Canon has influenced popular songs since what decade?
What phenomenon sees classical musicians achieving success in popular music?
Baroque or Classical era influence can be seen in what modern musical style?
Ritchie Blackmore and Randy Rhoads play what instrument?

context: Numerous examples show influence in the opposite direction, including popular songs based on classical music, the use to which Pachelbel's Canon has been put since <a0_0>the 1970s<a0_0/>, and <a1_0>the musical crossover phenomenon<a1_0/>, where classical musicians have achieved success in the popular music arena. In <a2_0>heavy metal<a2_0/>, a number of lead guitarists (playing <a3_0>electric guitar<a3_0/>) modeled their playing styles on Baroque or Classical era instrumental music, including Ritchie Blackmore and Randy Rhoads.
